entry.string: An error occurred while processing your request. The details are:
entry.translation: Un irrur ooccoorred vheele-a prucesseeng yuoor reqooest. Um de hur de hur de hur. Zee deteeels ere-a:

entry.string: Last updated on #(1)
entry.translation: Lest updeted oon #(1)

entry.string: Database error while executing: '#(1)'; error description is: '#(2)'.
entry.translation: Detebese-a irrur vheele-a ixecooteeng: '#(1)'; irrur descreepshun is: '#(2)'.

entry.string: Default message
entry.translation: Deffoolt messege

entry.string: No further information available
entry.translation: Nu foorzeer inffurmeshun efeeeleble

entry.string: Assertion in code failed
entry.translation: Essershun in cude-a feeeled

entry.string: An assertion evaluated to false, which indicates a coding error.
entry.translation: Un essershun ifelooeted tu felse-a, vheech indeecetes a cudeeng irrur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: While executing, an asserted condition failed. This means that a definite error in some code exists.
entry.translation: Vheele-a ixecooteeng, un esserted cundeeshun feeeled. Bork bork bork! Thees meuns thet a deffeenite-a irrur in sume-a cude-a ixeests. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Bad Parameter
entry.translation: Bed Peremeter

entry.string: A parameter encountered was bad.
entry.translation: A peremeter incuoontered ves bed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: A parameter provided during this operation could not be validated, or was not accepted for other reasons.
entry.translation: A peremeter prufeeded dooreeng thees oopereshun cuoold nut be-a feleedeted, oor ves nut eccepted fur oozeer reesuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Compiler error
entry.translation: Cumpeeler irrur

entry.string: The Blocklayout compiler encountered an error.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot cumpeeler incuoontered un irrur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: The Blocklayout compiler encountered an error it could not recover from. No specific information is available.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot cumpeeler incuoontered un irrur it cuoold nut recufer frum. Nu speceeffic inffurmeshun is efeeeleble-a.

entry.string: Xaraya is not properly configured
entry.translation: Xereya is nut pruperly cunffeegoored

entry.string: The combination of configuration settings has led to a conflict
entry.translation: Zee cumbeeneshun ooff cunffeegooreshun setteengs hes led tu a cunffleect

entry.string: Xaraya is configured with some settings which lead to a conflicting situation. Some configuration settings cannot be used simultaneously
entry.translation: Xereya is cunffeegoored veet sume-a setteengs vheech leed tu a cunffleecting seetooeshun. Sume-a cunffeegooreshun setteengs cunnut be-a used seemooltuneuoosly

entry.string: Context does not exist
entry.translation: Cuntext dues nut ixeest

entry.string: A context element was not found.
entry.translation: A cuntext ilement ves nut fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: This error is a catchall to describe situations where a context element (block, template, include) was expected but not found.
entry.translation: Thees irrur is a cetchell tu descreebe-a seetooeshuns vhere-a a cuntext ilement (bluck, templete-a, incloode-a) ves ixpected boot nut fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Database Error
entry.translation: Detebese-a Irrur

entry.string: An error was encountered while attempting a database operation.
entry.translation: Un irrur ves incuoontered vheele-a ettempteeng a detebese-a oopereshun.

entry.string: No further information is available.
entry.translation: Nu foorzeer inffurmeshun is efeeeleble-a.

entry.string: Database Query Error
entry.translation: Detebese-a Qooery Irrur

entry.string: An error was encountered while trying to execute a database query.
entry.translation: Un irrur ves incuoontered vheele-a tryeeng tu ixecoote-a a detebese-a qooery. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: A database query could not be executed, either because the query could not be understood or because it returned unexpected results.
entry.translation: A detebese-a qooery cuoold nut be-a ixecooted, ieezeer becoose-a zee qooery cuoold nut be-a understuud oor becoose-a it retoorned unexpected resoolts. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Deprecated API
entry.translation: Depreceted EPI

entry.string: A function call encountered belongs to a deprecated API.
entry.translation: A fooncshun cell incuoontered belungs tu a depreceted EPI.

entry.string: A function call encountered belongs to an old API and is therefore no longer supported.
entry.translation: A fooncshun cell incuoontered belungs tu un oold EPI und is zeereffure-a nu lunger sooppurted. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Deprecated Blocklayout Attribute
entry.translation: Depreceted Bluckleyuoot Ettreeboote

entry.string: A tag in a template contains a deprecated attribute.
entry.translation: A teg in a templete-a cunteeens a depreceted ettreeboote-a.

entry.string: A tag in a template contains a deprecated attribute and needs to be replaced by a new one, or be left out, see BL documentation for the right syntax.
entry.translation: A teg in a templete-a cunteeens a depreceted ettreeboote-a und needs tu be-a repleced by a noo oone-a, oor be-a lefft oooot, see-a BL ducoomenteshun fur zee reeght syntex.

entry.string: PHP: Fatal Error
entry.translation: PHP: Fetel Irrur

entry.string: A system error was received from the PHP interpreter.
entry.translation: A system irrur ves receeefed frum zee PHP interpreter. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: There is an error in the PHP code that is being processed.
entry.translation: Zeere-a is un irrur in zee PHP cude-a thet is beeeng prucessed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: PHP: Warning
entry.translation: PHP: Verneeng

entry.string: PHP: Parse Error
entry.translation: PHP: Perse-a Irrur

entry.string: PHP: Error Notice
entry.translation: PHP: Irrur Nuteece

entry.string: PHP: Core Error
entry.translation: PHP: Cure-a Irrur

entry.string: PHP: Core Warning
entry.translation: PHP: Cure-a Verneeng

entry.string: PHP: Compile Error
entry.translation: PHP: Cumpeele-a Irrur

entry.string: PHP: Compile Warning
entry.translation: PHP: Cumpeele-a Verneeng

entry.string: PHP: User Error
entry.translation: PHP: User Irrur

entry.string: PHP: User Warning
entry.translation: PHP: User Verneeng

entry.string: User Notice
entry.translation: User Nuteece

entry.string: Empty Parameter
entry.translation: Empty Peremeter

entry.string: A parameter value was not provided.
entry.translation: A peremeter felooe-a ves nut prufeeded. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: A parameter was expected during this operation, but none was found.
entry.translation: A peremeter ves ixpected dooreeng thees oopereshun, boot nune-a ves fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Event is not registered
entry.translation: Efent is nut regeestered

entry.string: An unknown event was encountered.
entry.translation: Un unknoon ifent ves incuoontered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: A reference to an event was encountered that is unknown to the system.
entry.translation: A refference-a tu un ifent ves incuoontered thet is unknoon tu zee system.

entry.string: Unknown system error
entry.translation: Unknoon system irrur

entry.string: An unknown system error was encountered.
entry.translation: Un unknoon system irrur ves incuoontered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The error system has encountered an error it cannot identify. Please help us correct this by filing a bug at bugs.xaraya.com.
entry.translation: Zee irrur system hes incuoontered un irrur it cunnut identeeffy. Bork bork bork! Pleese-a help us currect thees by feeling a boog et bugs.xaraya.com.

entry.string: Function failed
entry.translation: Fooncshun feeeled

entry.string: A call to a function returned a bad result.
entry.translation: A cell tu a fooncshun retoorned a bed resoolt. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: The function executed correctly, but the result was a failure.
entry.translation: Zee fooncshun ixecooted currectly, boot zee resoolt ves a feeeloore-a.

entry.string: Unknown ID
entry.translation: Unknoon ID

entry.string: An expected ID was not found.
entry.translation: Un ixpected ID ves nut fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: An item was requested by an ID that is not recognized. This could mean the item has been moved, changed, or does not exist.
entry.translation: Un item ves reqooested by un ID thet is nut recugneezed. Bork bork bork! Thees cuoold meun zee item hes beee mufed, chunged, oor dues nut ixeest. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Invalid attribute
entry.translation: Infeleed ettreeboote

entry.string: The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid attribute.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot perser incuoontered un infeleed ettreeboote-a.

entry.string: Invalid entity
entry.translation: Infeleed inteety

entry.string: The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid entity.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot perser incuoontered un infeleed inteety. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Invalid file
entry.translation: Infeleed feele

entry.string: The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid file.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot perser incuoontered un infeleed feele-a.

entry.string: The file was either not found, or could not be read properly.
entry.translation: Zee feele-a ves ieezeer nut fuoond, oor cuoold nut be-a reed pruperly. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Invalid instruction
entry.translation: Infeleed instroocshun

entry.string: The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid instruction.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot perser incuoontered un infeleed instroocshun.

entry.string: Invalid special variable
entry.translation: Infeleed speceeel fereeeble

entry.string: The Blocklayout parser encountered a problem with a special variable.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot perser incuoontered a prublem veet a speceeel fereeeble-a.

entry.string: Invalid syntax
entry.translation: Infeleed syntex

entry.string: The Blocklayout parser encountered a syntax error.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot perser incuoontered a syntex irrur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Invalid tag
entry.translation: Infeleed teg

entry.string: The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid tag.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot perser incuoontered un infeleed teg.

entry.string: The tag encountered does not conform to XML syntax.
entry.translation: Zee teg incuoontered dues nut cunffurm tu XML syntex.

entry.string: Locale not available
entry.translation: Lucele-a nut efeeeleble

entry.string: Locale does not exist
entry.translation: Lucele-a dues nut ixeest

entry.string: An unknown locale was encountered.
entry.translation: Un unknoon lucele-a ves incuoontered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: A reference to a locale was encountered that is unknown to the system.
entry.translation: A refference-a tu a lucele-a ves incuoontered thet is unknoon tu zee system.

entry.string: Missing attribute
entry.translation: Meessing ettreeboote

entry.string: The Blocklayout parser could not find a tag attribute.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot perser cuoold nut feend a teg ettreeboote-a.

entry.string: A tag attribute required by syntax was not found.
entry.translation: A teg ettreeboote-a reqooured by syntex ves nut fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Missing parameter
entry.translation: Meessing peremeter

entry.string: The Blocklayout parser could not resolve a tag parameter.
entry.translation: Zee Bluckleyuoot perser cuoold nut resulfe-a a teg peremeter. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: A tag parameter could not be resolved because of bad syntax.
entry.translation: A teg peremeter cuoold nut be-a resulfed becoose-a ooff bed syntex.

entry.string: Module Dependency
entry.translation: Mudoole-a Dependency

entry.string: A module call failed because of an unsatisifed dependency.
entry.translation: A mudoole-a cell feeeled becoose-a ooff un unseteesiffed dependency. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The current module cannot execute because another module that must first be installed is not present.
entry.translation: Zee coorrent mudoole-a cunnut ixecoote-a becoose-a unuzeer mudoole-a thet moost furst be-a instelled is nut present. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Module file does not exist
entry.translation: Mudoole-a feele-a dues nut ixeest

entry.string: An operation requires a module file that cannot be found.
entry.translation: Un oopereshun reqooures a mudoole-a feele-a thet cunnut be-a fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The file may be missing, or its name may have changed. Note: this error sometimes also occurs when a file cannot be parsed because of PHP errors.
entry.translation: Zee feele-a mey be-a meessing, oor its neme-a mey hefe-a chunged. Bork bork bork! Nute-a: thees irrur sumeteemes elsu ooccoors vhee a feele-a cunnut be-a persed becoose-a ooff PHP irrurs. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Module function does not exist
entry.translation: Mudoole-a fooncshun dues nut ixeest

entry.string: A call has been made to a module function that cannot be found.
entry.translation: A cell hes beee mede-a tu a mudoole-a fooncshun thet cunnut be-a fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The file in which the function was expected may be missing. If not, then the error may have occurred because the actual function has a different name, or does not exist. Note: this error sometimes also occurs when a file cannot be parsed because of PHP errors.
entry.translation: Zee feele-a in vheech zee fooncshun ves ixpected mey be-a meessing. Iff nut, zeen zee irrur mey hefe-a ooccoorred becoose-a zee ectooel fooncshun hes a deefffferent neme-a, oor dues nut ixeest. Um de hur de hur de hur. Nute-a: thees irrur sumeteemes elsu ooccoors vhee a feele-a cunnut be-a persed becoose-a ooff PHP irrurs. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Module is not active
entry.translation: Mudoole-a is nut ecteefe

entry.string: A call has been made to a module that is not active.
entry.translation: A cell hes beee mede-a tu a mudoole-a thet is nut ecteefe-a.

entry.string: A module was called that has not yet been activated/installed. Use the activate link in the modules module (Modules->ViewAll) to install modules.
entry.translation: A mudoole-a ves celled thet hes nut yet beee ecteefeted/instelled. Bork bork bork! Use-a zee ecteefete-a leenk in zee mudooles mudoole-a (Mudooles->FeeooEll) tu instell mudooles. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Module does not exist
entry.translation: Mudoole-a dues nut ixeest

entry.string: A call has been made to a module that cannot be found
entry.translation: A cell hes beee mede-a tu a mudoole-a thet cunnut be-a fuoond

entry.string: A module was called that has not yet been installed or is not present. Use the activate link in the modules module (Modules->ViewAll) to install modules. Note: this error sometimes also occurs when a file cannot be parsed because of PHP errors.
entry.translation: A mudoole-a ves celled thet hes nut yet beee instelled oor is nut present. Um de hur de hur de hur. Use-a zee ecteefete-a leenk in zee mudooles mudoole-a (Mudooles->FeeooEll) tu instell mudooles. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Nute-a: thees irrur sumeteemes elsu ooccoors vhee a feele-a cunnut be-a persed becoose-a ooff PHP irrurs. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: No Privilege
entry.translation: Nu Preefilege

entry.string: You do not have the privileges for this operation.
entry.translation: Yuoo du nut hefe-a zee preefileges fur thees oopereshun.

entry.string: An operation was attempted for which your user has not been assigned privileges. Privileges must be assigned by the system administrator(s).
entry.translation: Un oopereshun ves ettempted fur vheech yuoor user hes nut beee esseegned preefileges. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Preefileges moost be-a esseegned by zee system edmeenistretur(s).

entry.string: Not implemented
entry.translation: Nut implemented

entry.string: The requested feature is not available.
entry.translation: Zee reqooested feetoore-a is nut efeeeleble-a.

entry.string: A request was made to access a feature that is not available in this installation. The feature is either missing or unavailable in the current version of Xaraya.
entry.translation: A reqooest ves mede-a tu eccess a feetoore-a thet is nut efeeeleble-a in thees instelleshun. Zee feetoore-a is ieezeer meessing oor unefeeeleble-a in zee coorrent ferseeun ooff Xereya.

entry.string: System error
entry.translation: System irrur

entry.string: A system error was encountered.
entry.translation: A system irrur ves incuoontered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Template does not exist
entry.translation: Templete-a dues nut ixeest

entry.string: An unknown template name was encountered.
entry.translation: Un unknoon templete-a neme-a ves incuoontered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: An attempt was made to render a template that was not found. The template may have been removed or does not exist, or its name may have changed.
entry.translation: Un ettempt ves mede-a tu render a templete-a thet ves nut fuoond. Bork bork bork! Zee templete-a mey hefe-a beee remufed oor dues nut ixeest, oor its neme-a mey hefe-a chunged.

entry.string: Theme does not exist
entry.translation: Zeeme-a dues nut ixeest

entry.string: An unknown theme name was encountered.
entry.translation: Un unknoon zeeme-a neme-a ves incuoontered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: An attempt was made to display a theme that was not found. The theme may have been removed or does not exist, or its name may have changed.
entry.translation: Un ettempt ves mede-a tu deespley a zeeme-a thet ves nut fuoond. Bork bork bork! Zee zeeme-a mey hefe-a beee remufed oor dues nut ixeest, oor its neme-a mey hefe-a chunged. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Unable to load
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu lued

entry.string: An error was encountered during a load operation.
entry.translation: Un irrur ves incuoontered dooreeng a lued oopereshun.

entry.string: The system was unable to successfully load a component, such as a module or theme.
entry.translation: Zee system ves uneble-a tu sooccessffoolly lued a cumpunent, sooch es a mudoole-a oor zeeme-a.

entry.string: Unknown Error
entry.translation: Unknoon Irrur

entry.string: An unknown error was encountered.
entry.translation: Un unknoon irrur ves incuoontered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Variable is not registered
entry.translation: Fereeeble-a is nut regeestered

entry.string: You are attempting to call a variable that the system does not recognize.
entry.translation: Yuoo ere-a ettempteeng tu cell a fereeeble-a thet zee system dues nut recugneeze-a.

entry.string: An error was encountered during a call to a variable. The variable may have been removed, or its name changed.
entry.translation: Un irrur ves incuoontered dooreeng a cell tu a fereeeble-a. Zee fereeeble-a mey hefe-a beee remufed, oor its neme-a chunged. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: XML Parser Error
entry.translation: XML Perser Irrur

entry.string: The XML parser has encountered an error.
entry.translation: Zee XML perser hes incuoontered un irrur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: The XML parser tried to execute a line that was not well formed.
entry.translation: Zee XML perser treeed tu ixecoote-a a leene-a thet ves nut vell furmed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Block type already exists
entry.translation: Bluck type-a elreedy ixeests

entry.string: An attempt was made to register a block type in a module that already exists.
entry.translation: Un ettempt ves mede-a tu regeester a bluck type-a in a mudoole-a thet elreedy ixeests. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Bad Data
entry.translation: Bed Deta

entry.string: The data provided was bad.
entry.translation: Zee deta prufeeded ves bed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The value provided during this operation could not be validated, or was not accepted for other reasons.
entry.translation: Zee felooe-a prufeeded dooreeng thees oopereshun cuoold nut be-a feleedeted, oor ves nut eccepted fur oozeer reesuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Duplicate Data
entry.translation: Doopleecete-a Deta

entry.string: The data provided was a duplicate.
entry.translation: Zee deta prufeeded ves a doopleecete-a.

entry.string: A unique value was expected during this operation, but the value provided is a duplicate of an existing value.
entry.translation: A uneeqooe-a felooe-a ves ixpected dooreeng thees oopereshun, boot zee felooe-a prufeeded is a doopleecete-a ooff un ixeesting felooe-a.

entry.string: Forbidden Operation
entry.translation: Furbeeddee Oopereshun

entry.string: The operation you are attempting is not allowed in the current circumstances.
entry.translation: Zee oopereshun yuoo ere-a ettempteeng is nut ellooed in zee coorrent curcoomstunces. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: You may have clicked on the browser's back or refresh button and reattempted an operation that may not be repeated, or your browser may not have cookies enabled.
entry.translation: Yuoo mey hefe-a cleecked oon zee brooser's beck oor reffresh boottun und reettempted un oopereshun thet mey nut be-a repeeted, oor yuoor brooser mey nut hefe-a cuukeees inebled. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Login error
entry.translation: Lugeen irrur

entry.string: A problem was encountered during the login process.
entry.translation: A prublem ves incuoontered dooreeng zee lugeen prucess. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Missing Data
entry.translation: Meessing Deta

entry.string: The data is incomplete.
entry.translation: Zee deta is incumplete-a.

entry.string: A value was expected during this operation, but none was found.
entry.translation: A felooe-a ves ixpected dooreeng thees oopereshun, boot nune-a ves fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Multiple instances
entry.translation: Moolteeple-a instunces

entry.string: A module contains more than one instance of the same block type.
entry.translation: A mudoole-a cunteeens mure-a thun oone-a instunce-a ooff zee seme-a bluck type-a.

entry.string: Not logged in
entry.translation: Nut lugged in

entry.string: You are attempting an operation that is not allowed for the Anonymous user.
entry.translation: Yuoo ere-a ettempteeng un oopereshun thet is nut ellooed fur zee Ununymuoos user. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: An operation was encountered that requires the user to be logged in. If you are currently logged in please report this as a bug.
entry.translation: Un oopereshun ves incuoontered thet reqooures zee user tu be-a lugged in. Bork bork bork! Iff yuoo ere-a coorrently lugged in pleese-a repurt thees es a boog.

entry.string: Wrong version
entry.translation: Vrung ferseeun

entry.string: The application version supplied is wrong.
entry.translation: Zee eppleeceshun ferseeun sooppleeed is vrung.

entry.string: The site is locked
entry.translation: Zee seete-a is lucked

entry.string: No access at this time
entry.translation: Nu eccess et thees teeme

entry.string: No validation type present.
entry.translation: Nu feleedeshun type-a present. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: The #(1) type '#(2)' could not be found.
entry.translation: Zee #(1) type-a '#(2)' cuoold nut be-a fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Not an array: "#(1)"
entry.translation: Nut un errey: "#(1)"

entry.string: Array variable has less elements "#(1)" than the specified minimum "#(2)"
entry.translation: Errey fereeeble-a hes less ilements "#(1)" thun zee speceeffied meenimoom "#(2)"

entry.string: Array variable has more elements "#(1)" than the specified maximum "#(2)"
entry.translation: Errey fereeeble-a hes mure-a ilements "#(1)" thun zee speceeffied mexeemoom "#(2)"

entry.string: Variable "#(1)" is not boolean
entry.translation: Fereeeble-a "#(1)" is nut buuleun

entry.string: Not a checkbox Type: "#(1)"
entry.translation: Nut a checkbux Type-a: "#(1)"

entry.string: Invalid Variable #(1), does not match an e-mail type.
entry.translation: Infeleed Fereeeble-a #(1), dues nut metch un i-meeel type-a.

entry.string: Input "#(1)" was not one of the possibilities: "
entry.translation: Inpoot "#(1)" ves nut oone-a ooff zee pusseebilities: "

entry.string: Not a Float Type: "#(1)"
entry.translation: Nut a Fluet Type-a: "#(1)"

entry.string: Float Value "#(1)" is smaller than the specified minimum "#(2)"
entry.translation: Fluet Felooe-a "#(1)" is smeller thun zee speceeffied meenimoom "#(2)"

entry.string: Float Value "#(1)" is bigger than the specified maximum "#(2)"
entry.translation: Fluet Felooe-a "#(1)" is beegger thun zee speceeffied mexeemoom "#(2)"

entry.string: Tag not allowed: "#(1)"
entry.translation: Teg nut ellooed: "#(1)"

entry.string: Attributes are not allowed for this tag : "#(1)"
entry.translation: Ettreebootes ere-a nut ellooed fur thees teg : "#(1)"

entry.string: Not an Integer Type: "#(1)"
entry.translation: Nut un Integer Type-a: "#(1)"

entry.string: Integer Value "#(1)" is smaller than the specified minimum "#(2)"
entry.translation: Integer Felooe-a "#(1)" is smeller thun zee speceeffied meenimoom "#(2)"

entry.string: Integer Value "#(1)" is bigger than the specified maximum "#(2)"
entry.translation: Integer Felooe-a "#(1)" is beegger thun zee speceeffied mexeemoom "#(2)"

entry.string: Variable not set!
entry.translation: Fereeeble-a nut set!

entry.string: Invalid e-mail #(1), the mail server doesnt recognize it.
entry.translation: Infeleed i-meeel #(1), zee meeel serfer duesnt recugneeze-a it. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Unable to connect to the mail server #(1) for e-mail #(2).
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu cunnect tu zee meeel serfer #(1) fur i-meeel #(2).

entry.string: Variable "#(1)" should not be empty
entry.translation: Fereeeble-a "#(1)" shuoold nut be-a impty

entry.string: Variable "#(1)" did not match pattern "#(2)"
entry.translation: Fereeeble-a "#(1)" deed nut metch pettern "#(2)"

entry.string: Not a string: "#(1)"
entry.translation: Nut a streeng: "#(1)"

entry.string: Size of the string "#(1)" is smaller than the specified minimum "#(2)"
entry.translation: Seeze-a ooff zee streeng "#(1)" is smeller thun zee speceeffied meenimoom "#(2)"

entry.string: Size of the string "#(1)" is bigger than the specified maximum "#(2)"
entry.translation: Seeze-a ooff zee streeng "#(1)" is beegger thun zee speceeffied mexeemoom "#(2)"

entry.string: This call needs to be removed
entry.translation: Thees cell needs tu be-a remufed

entry.string: Confirm
entry.translation: Cunffurm

entry.string: Context type: #(1) and file name: #(2)
entry.translation: Cuntext type-a: #(1) und feele-a neme-a: #(2)

entry.string: modvarid for module #(1) variable #(2)
entry.translation: mudfereed fur mudoole-a #(1) fereeeble-a #(2)

entry.string: Module or Theme Name #(1) is empty.
entry.translation: Mudoole-a oor Zeeme-a Neme-a #(1) is impty. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Empty RegId (#(1)) or RegId is equal to 0.
entry.translation: Empty RegId (#(1)) oor RegId is iqooel tu 0.

entry.string: Unknown
entry.translation: Unknoon

entry.string: This module is not installed properly. Not all info could be retrieved
entry.translation: Thees mudoole-a is nut instelled pruperly. Bork bork bork! Nut ell inffu cuoold be-a retreeefed

entry.string: Unable to find Base Info for Module: #(1)
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu feend Bese-a Inffu fur Mudoole-a: #(1)

entry.string: Module Name #(1) is empty.
entry.translation: Mudoole-a Neme-a #(1) is impty. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Could not load function file: [#(1)].nn Error Caught:n #(2)
entry.translation: Cuoold nut lued fooncshun feele-a: [#(1)].nn Irrur Cooght:n #(2)

entry.string: Module function #(1) does not exist.
entry.translation: Mudoole-a fooncshun #(1) dues nut ixeest. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Module API function #(1) does not exist or could not be loaded.
entry.translation: Mudoole-a EPI fooncshun #(1) dues nut ixeest oor cuoold nut be-a lueded. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Empty Module or Theme Name (#(1)).
entry.translation: Empty Mudoole-a oor Zeeme-a Neme-a (#(1)).

entry.string: Directory information #(1) is empty.
entry.translation: Durectury inffurmeshun #(1) is impty. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Cannot open file #(1).
entry.translation: Cunnut oopee feele-a #(1).

entry.string: Wrong type, it must be 'module' or 'theme': #(1).
entry.translation: Vrung type-a, it moost be-a 'mudoole' oor 'zeeme-a': #(1).

entry.string: Module #(1) does not exist.
entry.translation: Mudoole-a #(1) dues nut ixeest. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Theme #(1) does not exist.
entry.translation: Zeeme-a #(1) dues nut ixeest. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Empty theme or module name (#(1)).
entry.translation: Empty zeeme-a oor mudoole-a neme-a (#(1)).

entry.string: Empty Theme or Module variable name (#(1)).
entry.translation: Empty Zeeme-a oor Mudoole-a fereeeble-a neme-a (#(1)).

entry.string: Illegal attribute name ('#(1)'): Attribute name may contain letters, numbers, _ and -, and must start with a letter.
entry.translation: Illegel ettreeboote-a neme-a ('#(1)'): Ettreeboote-a neme-a mey cunteeen letters, noombers, _ und -, und moost stert veet a letter. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Illegal attribute flags ('#(1)'): flags must be of integer type.
entry.translation: Illegel ettreeboote-a flegs ('#(1)'): flegs moost be-a ooff integer type-a.

entry.string: Illegal tag definition: '#(1)' is an invalid tag name.
entry.translation: Illegel teg deffeenishun: '#(1)' is un infeleed teg neme-a.

entry.string: Illegal tag definition: '#(1)' is an invalid handler.
entry.translation: Illegel teg deffeenishun: '#(1)' is un infeleed hundler. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Illegal tag registration flags ('#(1)'): flags must be of integer type.
entry.translation: Illegel teg regeestreshun flegs ('#(1)'): flegs moost be-a ooff integer type-a.

entry.string: <xar:#(1)> tag is already defined.
entry.translation: <xar:#(1)> teg is elreedy deffeened. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: <xar:#(1)> tag is not defined.
entry.translation: <xar:#(1)> teg is nut deffeened. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: '#(1)' attribute in <xar:#(2)> tag does not have correct type. See tag documentation.
entry.translation: '#(1)' ettreeboote-a in <xar:#(2)> teg dues nut hefe-a currect type-a. See-a teg ducoomenteshun.

entry.string: Required '#(1)' attribute is missing from <xar:#(2)> tag. See tag documentation.
entry.translation: Reqooured '#(1)' ettreeboote-a is meessing frum <xar:#(2)> teg. See-a teg ducoomenteshun.

entry.string: Empty themeName (#(1)).
entry.translation: Empty zeemeNeme-a (#(1)).

entry.string: User identified by uid #(1) does not exist.
entry.translation: User identeeffied by ueed #(1) dues nut ixeest. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: User variable #(1) was not correctly registered
entry.translation: User fereeeble-a #(1) ves nut currectly regeestered

entry.string: Security Realm #(1) - Component #(2) - Instance #(3) - Level #(4) : This call needs to be converted to the Xaraya security system
entry.translation: Secooreety Reelm #(1) - Cumpunent #(2) - Instunce-a #(3) - Lefel #(4) : Thees cell needs tu be-a cunferted tu zee Xereya secooreety system

entry.string: Parameters to winnow need to be arrays
entry.translation: Peremeters tu veennoo need tu be-a erreys

entry.string: Did not find a mask registered for an unspecified component in module #(1)
entry.translation: Deed nut feend a mesk regeestered fur un unspeceeffied cumpunent in mudoole-a #(1)

entry.string: No masks registered for component #(1) in module #(2)
entry.translation: Nu mesks regeestered fur cumpunent #(1) in mudoole-a #(2)

entry.string: No privilege for #(1)
entry.translation: Nu preefilege-a fur #(1)

entry.string: A query is missing in component #(1) of module #(2)
entry.translation: A qooery is meessing in cumpunent #(1) ooff mudoole-a #(2)

entry.string: #(1) and #(2) do not have the same instances. #(3) | #(4) | #(5)
entry.translation: #(1) und #(2) du nut hefe-a zee seme-a instunces. Um gesh dee bork, bork! #(3) | #(4) | #(5)

entry.string: You must enter a name.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost inter a neme-a.

entry.string: This entry already exists.
entry.translation: Thees intry elreedy ixeests. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: You must enter a user name and a valid email address.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost inter a user neme-a und a feleed imeeel eddress. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: deleted
entry.translation: deleted

entry.string: The operation #(1) is not supported
entry.translation: Zee oopereshun #(1) is nut sooppurted

entry.string: SELECT with total of columns different from the number retrieved.
entry.translation: SELECT veet tutel ooff culoomns deefffferent frum zee noomber retreeefed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The table #(1) you are trying to add needs to be a string or an array.
entry.translation: Zee teble-a #(1) yuoo ere-a tryeeng tu edd needs tu be-a a streeng oor un errey. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: This function only take 1 or 2 parameters
entry.translation: Thees fooncshun oonly teke-a 1 oor 2 peremeters

entry.string: The field #(1) you are trying to add needs to be a string or an array.
entry.translation: Zee feeeld #(1) yuoo ere-a tryeeng tu edd needs tu be-a a streeng oor un errey. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Your query has no fields.
entry.translation: Yuoor qooery hes nu feeelds. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Show the Users in this Group
entry.translation: Shoo zee Users in thees Gruoop

entry.string: Delete this Group
entry.translation: Delete-a thees Gruoop

entry.string: Email the Users in this Group
entry.translation: Emeeel zee Users in thees Gruoop

entry.string: Show the Privileges assigned to this Group
entry.translation: Shoo zee Preefileges esseegned tu thees Gruoop

entry.string: Test this Groups's Privileges
entry.translation: Test thees Gruoops's Preefileges

entry.string: Modify this Group
entry.translation: Mudeeffy thees Gruoop

entry.string: subgroup
entry.translation: soobgruoop

entry.string: subgroups
entry.translation: soobgruoops

entry.string: user
entry.translation: user

entry.string: users
entry.translation: users
